column6: THE FANTASTIC PART 6 (OF 6) The Mole Man and his army of ani-men confront the only four people in the world who can stop his plan of global conquest. Guess who they are?
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:John Dell | penciller (cover):Dale Keown | penciller:Adam Kubert | penciller:Andy Kubert | colorist:Dave Stewart
